Freeze's Github

I make things I think are cool. My code is unorginazed, unoptimized, and allaround not classy. you can find more about me Here

Projects

Swiss

No-signup, No-AI, and No-Bullshit, Web multitool that can be a photo editor, quick audio editor, code editor, video editor, and more (in the future it only works with audio editing right now). It's open source, and I have a lot of plans for it, but it's already pretty useful as is. Its just an overall swiss army knife for quick edits and things.

Project Link:

Stratosphere VE

Virtual Environment (like Proxmox) written in GOLang. A project that has no codebase (lol), but I have a lot of plans for it. It's fully modular, and all the components can be replaced with custom ones, and it will [of course] be open source. It is just individual GO binaries right now, but in the future it is just going to be bundled in a linux iso that you can install easily.

Project Link:

Securly Source-Code

Not my code, but fun to upload the source and help get this spyware out of schools. All the code is ripped and extracted from the crx I downloaded directly through the extension update manifest. Also very interesting what domains they block which you can look at on urls in the README.md

Project Link:
